person.persName: J. T. Farris (Louisville, Kentucky, detective and soldier)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, detective and soldier. Served in the 5th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as first lieutenant and regimental quartermaster from October 1861 to February 1862. Served in the 9th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment from as major from August 1862 to March 1863. Commander of Barracks No. 1 in Louisville, Kentucky, from March 1863 to October 1863. Detective in Louisville from 1863 to 1864.
